Package: io.vertx.ext.mongo

[Java] Class FindOptions

    • io.vertx.ext.mongo.FindOptions

    • Options used to configure find operations.

      Authors:
      Nick Scavelli

      • Field Summary

          Fields 
          Modifiers Name Description
          static int  DEFAULT_LIMIT The default value of limit = -1, signifying no limit
          static int  DEFAULT_SKIP The default value of skip = 0
